suite.name: Test Edu

test.name: Scenario de teste 01 - Acesso ao menu eletronicos

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Acessar a home page do site Amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Verificar se o título da página fica "Amazon.com.br | Tudo pra você, de A a Z."
kw.sourcename: Verificar se o título da página fica "${TITULO}"

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Amazon.com.br | Tudo pra você, de A a Z.'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verificar se aparece a frase "Eletrônicos e Tecnologia"
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Verificar se o título da página fica "Eletrônicos e Tecnologia | Amazon.com.br"
kw.sourcename: Verificar se o título da página fica "${TITULO}"

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Eletrônicos e Tecnologia | Amazon.com.br'.

kw.name: Verificar se aparece a categoria "Computadores e Informática"
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: esse teste verifica o meno eletronicos do site amazom

test.name: Scenario de teste 02 - pesquisa de protudo

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Acessar a home page do site Amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Digitar o nome de produto "Xbox Series S" no campo de pesquisa
kw.sourcename: Digitar o nome de produto "${TEXTO_BUSCA}" no campo de pesquisa

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Xbox Series S' into text field 'twotabsearchtextbox'.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verificar resultado da pesquisa se esta listando o produto "Xbox Series S"
kw.sourcename: Verificar resultado da pesquisa se esta listando o produto "${PRODUTO}"

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: esse teste verifica a busca de um produto

test.name: Caso de Teste 03 - Adicionar Produto no Carrinho

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Acessar a home page do site Amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Digitar o nome de produto "Xbox Series S" no campo de pesquisa
kw.sourcename: Digitar o nome de produto "${TEXTO_BUSCA}" no campo de pesquisa

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Xbox Series S' into text field 'twotabsearchtextbox'.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verificar o resultado da pesquisa se está listando o produto "Console Xbox Series S"
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Adicionar o produto "Console Xbox Series S" no carrinho
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verificar se o produto "Console Xbox Series S" foi adicionado com sucesso
Element Should Be Visible
kw.arg: locator=//span[@class='a-size-medium-plus a-color-base sw-atc-text a-text-bold'][contains(.,'Adicionado ao carrinho')]
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
kw.msg: Element '//span[@class='a-size-medium-plus a-color-base sw-atc-text a-text-bold'][contains(.,'Adicionado ao carrinho')]' is displayed.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Esse teste verifica a adição de um produto no carrinho de compras

test.name: Caso de Teste 04 - Remover Produto do Carrinho

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

Element Should Be Visible
kw.arg: locator=//span[@class='a-size-medium-plus a-color-base sw-atc-text a-text-bold'][contains(.,'Adicionado ao carrinho')]
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Remover o produto "Console Xbox Series S" do carrinho
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verificar se o carrinho fica vazio
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.arg: locator=//h1[@class='a-spacing-mini a-spacing-top-base'][contains(.,'Seu carrinho de compras da Amazon está vazio.')]
message=Seu carrinho de compras da Amazon está vazio.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
kw.msg: Element '//h1[@class='a-spacing-mini a-spacing-top-base'][contains(.,'Seu carrinho de compras da Amazon está vazio.')]' is displayed.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Esse teste verifica a remoção de um produto no carrinho de compras

suite.doc: essa suite testa o saite da amazom.com.br
